data.partBlankContent: Shannon turned 30 last weekend. She h__ been drea____ the n__ decade f__ a f__ years. But hav___ reached i_, s__ found her____ more sati_____ with h__ life th__ she h__ expected. With the new age, she felt increasingly mature, confident, and centered.
data.fullContent: Shannon turned 30 last weekend. She has been dreaming the new decade for a few years. But having reached it, she found herself more satisfied with her life than she had expected. With the new age, she felt increasingly mature, confident, and centered.
data.answer: 香农上周末刚满30岁。几年来她一直梦想着新的十年。但是到了30后，她发现自己对自己的生活比她之前所期望的还要满意。随着新时代的到来，她感到越来越成熟、自信和专注。
